principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyber-Security aesthetics with Swiss Clarity.
Density with Breathing Room: High data density for dashboards, but grouped logically.
Visual Hierarchy: Color is for status and action only, not decoration.
The 'Grid Border' Look: Visible structure implies security and stability.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Outfit' for all H1-H6. Weight: SemiBold (600) or Bold (700). Tracking: tight.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Public Sans' for all paragraphs and UI text. Weight: Regular (400) or Medium (500).
usage_rules.data: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for IP addresses, IDs, and financial figures.
anti_patterns: Do not use Inter for headings.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Outfit:wght@400;600;700&family=Public+Sans:wght@400;500;600&display=swap');

grid_system.dashboard: The 'Control Room' Grid: Dense, 4-column layout (grid-cols-4). Gap-4. Widgets span 1, 2, or 4 columns.
grid_system.marketing: The 'Tetris' Grid: Asymmetrical, 12-column layout. Gap-8. Overlapping elements.

spacing.container_padding: p-6 or p-8 for main content areas.
spacing.element_gap: gap-4 for forms, gap-6 for layout sections.

style_guide.cards: Grid Borders Style: Flat background (#0F111A), 1px border (#1E293B). No shadow by default. Hover: Border becomes Primary (#7C3AED).
style_guide.buttons: Sharp corners or slightly rounded (rounded-md). Primary: Solid Purple. Secondary: Outline Slate.

visual_assets.icons: Lucide React (Default). Use Phosphor Icons for specific security metaphors if needed.

login_background.usage: Full screen background with overlay bg-black/80

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-200 or lighter on dark backgrounds.

tech_stack_rules.file_extensions: Use .js for all component files. Use .jsx only if strictly required by build tool, but prefer .js.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided in 'tailwind_config_extension'.
3. SCAFFOLD LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that implements the Sidebar + Header + Main Content pattern.
4. USE SHADCN: Use the existing Shadcn components in /components/ui but style them according to the 'Grid Borders' rule.
5. LOGIN PAGE: Build a high-impact login page using the 'login_background' image and a glassmorphism card.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
7. FILE EXTENSIONS: Create all new components as .js files.
8. DO NOT ASK QUESTIONS: Make executive design decisions based on this guide.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered layouts.
Dark Mode is Default: Design for dark mode first. Light mode is secondary.
Micro-Interactions: Every button must have a hover state.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Don't cram content.
